(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP
        (NP (DT this) (NN episode))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Singapore) (NNP Talking)))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
det(episode-3, this-2)
pobj(In-1, episode-3)
prep(episode-3, of-4)
nn(Talking-6, Singapore-5)
pobj(of-4, Talking-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VB discuss)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN topic))
        (PP (IN of)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB how))
            (S
              (NP (PRP we))
              (VP (VBP are)
                (VP (VBG going)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB preserve)
                        (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Singapore) (NNP Hawker) (NNP Culture))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NN midst))
                            (PP (IN of)
                              (NP (NN modernization)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(discuss-2, we-1)
root(ROOT-0, discuss-2)
det(topic-4, the-3)
dobj(discuss-2, topic-4)
prep(topic-4, of-5)
advmod(going-9, how-6)
nsubj(going-9, we-7)
aux(going-9, are-8)
pcomp(of-5, going-9)
aux(preserve-11, to-10)
xcomp(going-9, preserve-11)
poss(Culture-15, our-12)
nn(Culture-15, Singapore-13)
nn(Culture-15, Hawker-14)
dobj(preserve-11, Culture-15)
prep(preserve-11, in-16)
det(midst-18, the-17)
pobj(in-16, midst-18)
prep(midst-18, of-19)
pobj(of-19, modernization-20)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN Of)
    (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS points)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT which))
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (VBD discussed))
          (, ,))))))


root(ROOT-0, Of-1)
predet(points-4, all-2)
det(points-4, the-3)
pobj(Of-1, points-4)
dobj(discussed-7, which-5)
nsubj(discussed-7, we-6)
ccomp(points-4, discussed-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT the)
            (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ interesting)
              (CC and)
              (JJ practical))
            (NN point))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP (MD should)
                  (VP (VB include)
                    (NP (NNP Singapore) (NN heritage) (NN food) (NNS recipes))
                    (PP (IN into)
                      (NP (PRP$ our) (NN school) (NN curriculum)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
det(point-8, the-3)
advmod(interesting-5, most-4)
amod(point-8, interesting-5)
cc(interesting-5, and-6)
conj(interesting-5, practical-7)
nsubj(is-9, point-8)
ccomp(think-2, is-9)
mark(include-13, that-10)
nsubj(include-13, we-11)
aux(include-13, should-12)
ccomp(is-9, include-13)
nn(recipes-17, Singapore-14)
nn(recipes-17, heritage-15)
nn(recipes-17, food-16)
dobj(include-13, recipes-17)
prep(include-13, into-18)
poss(curriculum-21, our-19)
nn(curriculum-21, school-20)
pobj(into-18, curriculum-21)


(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB Why))
    (SQ (VBP are)
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBG teaching)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS kids))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB how))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB make)
                (NP (NNS muffins))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NN home) (NN economics) (NN class))
                    (CC and)
                    (NP (RB not) (NNP Ang) (NNP Ku) (NNP Kueh))))))))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(teaching-4, Why-1)
aux(teaching-4, are-2)
nsubj(teaching-4, we-3)
root(ROOT-0, teaching-4)
poss(kids-6, our-5)
dobj(teaching-4, kids-6)
advmod(make-9, how-7)
aux(make-9, to-8)
xcomp(teaching-4, make-9)
dobj(make-9, muffins-10)
prep(make-9, in-11)
nn(class-14, home-12)
nn(class-14, economics-13)
pobj(in-11, class-14)
cc(class-14, and-15)
neg(Kueh-19, not-16)
nn(Kueh-19, Ang-17)
nn(Kueh-19, Ku-18)
conj(class-14, Kueh-19)


(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB Why))
    (SQ (VBP are)
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBN taught)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB make)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (JJ French) (NN Omelette))
                (PP (RB instead) (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Oyster) (NNP Omelette))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ culinary) (NNS schools)))))))))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(taught-4, Why-1)
auxpass(taught-4, are-2)
nsubjpass(taught-4, they-3)
root(ROOT-0, taught-4)
aux(make-6, to-5)
xcomp(taught-4, make-6)
det(Omelette-9, a-7)
amod(Omelette-9, French-8)
dobj(make-6, Omelette-9)
advmod(of-11, instead-10)
prep(Omelette-9, of-11)
nn(Omelette-13, Oyster-12)
pobj(of-11, Omelette-13)
prep(Omelette-13, in-14)
poss(schools-17, our-15)
amod(schools-17, culinary-16)
pobj(in-14, schools-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBP do)
      (VP (VB need)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB include)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Singapore) (NNP Hawker) (NNP Cuisine))
                (PP (IN as)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN module)))))))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP train)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ next) (NN generation))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNS chefs)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(need-4, We-1)
advmod(need-4, really-2)
aux(need-4, do-3)
root(ROOT-0, need-4)
aux(include-6, to-5)
xcomp(need-4, include-6)
nn(Cuisine-9, Singapore-7)
nn(Cuisine-9, Hawker-8)
dobj(include-6, Cuisine-9)
prep(Cuisine-9, as-10)
det(module-12, a-11)
pobj(as-10, module-12)
advmod(train-15, when-13)
nsubj(train-15, we-14)
advcl(need-4, train-15)
poss(generation-18, our-16)
amod(generation-18, next-17)
dobj(train-15, generation-18)
prep(generation-18, of-19)
pobj(of-19, chefs-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (NNP Part) (NNP II)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(II-4, Here-1)
cop(II-4, is-2)
nn(II-4, Part-3)
root(ROOT-0, II-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Part))
    (VP (VBZ III))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(III-2, Part-1)
root(ROOT-0, III-2)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Part) (NNP IV) (. .)))


nn(IV-2, Part-1)
root(ROOT-0, IV-2)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP (NNP Sen)))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (DT the) (NN upload)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, Sen-3)
prep(Thanks-1, for-4)
det(upload-6, the-5)
pobj(for-4, upload-6)
